_header: In faith ye be to blame / for my good will me to defame
Note:
Cf. Muir (1950)
XMuir, Kenneth. Collected Poems [Sir Thomas Wyatt]. Cambridge, MA: Harvard UP, 1950, no. 113.
Subjects: love, vicissitudes of; songs; farewells, lovers’
_description: Love scorned — three quatrains (aaab) with burden: ‘And wyll ye serue me so / For my kyndnes thus to serue me soo.’
